root.title: Chocolate Fudge Cake (Recipe Found on Pinterest)
root.heading: SERVINGS:
INGREDIENTS:
DIRECTIONS:
root.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9 inch square baking dish with cooking spray. Set aside.
In a large bowl, combine 3/4 granulated sugar, flour, 1/4 cup cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt. Stir in milk, melted butter, and vanilla. Using a hand mixer, beat mixture until smooth.
Pour the batter into a 9 inch baking dish.
In a small bowl, combine the remaining 1/2 cup granulated sugar, remaining cocoa powder, and the brown sugar. Sprinkle mixture evenly over batter.
Pour hot water overtop Do not stir!
Bake for 32-35 minutes or until center is almost set. Remove from the oven and let stand for ten minutes.
Serve in individual dishes. Top with ice cream or fresh whipped topping.
